Killing Floor is one of the best old zombie killing first person shooters on steam. The game is not that demanding for specs ect, so even those of you who do not have the beastiest computer in the world can play it. It is a great game to play on your own, with friends or even with people who you don't know. I would strongly recommend you get this game and you will have hours of fun.

И так, то что мне понравилось тут кооп. игра, выбор разных классов, много оружий, и сама игра шикарная. Мне больше всего здесь нравится то - что тут есть разные карты (т.е. не надо играть 1 и ту же карту). И да если бы вы сделали такое обновление так сказать ну... добавили бы нового босса и новых зомби было бы зачетная игра. Но в принципе скажу игра нам с другом (TaskForce141) понравилось.

fun game

Bem, uma analise bem rápida, pois o jogo per se dispensa comentários: Killing Floor é um jogo de FPS onde o objetivo é eliminar os Espécimes (nada mais são que zumbis modificados) que aparecem no cenário em ondas (Waves) e, com o dinheiro ganho com cada morte, comprar mais equipamentos para as próximas ondas, que vão crescendo em dificuldade. Em si, a concepção é simples, e o jogo é bem simples no nível iniciante, mas a verdadeira ação começa nos níveis acima do Normal: o verdadeiro inferno!

O personagem do jogo pode escolher certas profissões (Perks) que deve evoluir seguindo os requisitos de cada uma (O médico precisa curar o time, o Atirador de Elite precisa arrancar cabeças com tiros precisos, e etc) e deve, com um time composto de 6 pessoas, completar as waves nos mapas até o boss final.

Parece simples? Sim, ainda é, mas dentro do jogo, com hordas quase infinitas de monstros, sem um local seguro pra se esconder, com munição limitada e principalmente se o time não colaborar com cada um fazendo seu trabalho, prepare-se para a encrenca! O jogo é bastante desafiador e, mesmo no nível máximo de sua profissão escolhida (pode ser trocada a qualquer momento sem perder o progresso) é quase impossível derrotar os inimigos do nível mais alto sozinho (embora existam uns coreanos que conseguem).
one of the best zombie killing games i have ever played 10/10

Killing Floor is a first-person survival horror horde game with two different game modes. In the classic Killing Floor game mode you have to defend you and your team from several waves of varying types of zombies and defeat the final boss at the end. In Objective mode you have to complete a set of objectives while defending yourself and your team from waves of zombies and then defeat a final boss at the end... I've only just realised how familiar they sound. There are seven classes to choose from, which consist of your generic healer, shotguner, marksman, assault rifler, beserker, pyro and demolitions.

So, first of all, let's get one thing clear: Yes, that's all you do. I've heard criticism from a number of people sdtating that Killing Floor seems to be extremely repetetive. And yes, it is, but the game is so fun that it doesn't matter. I could argue that deathmatch on 'insert generic shooter here' is repetetive since all that consists of is running around and getting shot, and yet that's still fun!

But before I praise the game for what it does well, let's clear up on what it does badly:
The voice acting is awful, but is still corny and funny. Hearing the pyro from Team Fortress 2 calling someone a 'plod' in a cockney accent thicker than paint is hilarious.
The game looks dated, but that's no surprise considering it's running on Unreal 2.5; having said that it still looks like a really good PS2 game, so it's bearable.
A few of the zombie types are a bit overpowered, such as the Siren, who's screams have a range longer than they look, ignore armour and shake your screen to the point where it's impossible to make anything out. The Patriarch's chain gun seems to deal a little too much damage, even for the final boss. And the Skrake has way too much health.

But what is the game good for?
For starters, this game has some of the best use of classes I have seen. Each class has subtle yet effective buffs to their use in weapons, with the more noticeable ones being discounts for their weapons types, and spawning with a free class specific gun when that class level is really high. Every class can equip every weapon, and every class can be upgraded regardless of which one you're playing as, which is great.
The guns are SO satisfying to use, and I really recommend buying the weapons DLC packs. At the very least, if you're only going to buy one, I recommend the Steampunk one. They are some of the most interesting guns I have seen in a game, and they are guns used in the more popular classes.
What makes the guns so satisfying? The high, yet affordable costs, the size, the models, the recoil, the gorgeous sounds, the power, even the reload animations come together to create such amazing toys that are simply a joy to use.
The maps are all different and really well made, even though a few too many are rather grey and brown, though to be honest, if I were modelling London, I couldn't have done it any other way.
The zombie types are interesting and threatening in their own way, with each one possessing an ability that synergises well with all other zombie powers. Even the weakest variation, the Clots, you will learn to hate because of their grab ability that really screws with you when you're trying to backpedal away from a Fleshpound. If there are any two zombies alike, its the Skrake and Fleshpound, but apart from that, they're all different.
And this game is a joy to play with friends. Do not get this game unless you have someone to play it with, it is great. And when you buy Killing Floor, you get two coupons to give to friends that allow them a limited time access to it so they can try it!

One last recommendation: Killing Floor is one of those regular sale products on Steam, so wait until its on an inevitable sale, and I don't think a year has gone by when it hasn't been on sale at Christmas.
Simply put, buy Killing Floor.

1. Из своих 20 лет жизни я играю в шутеры уже 8, из этого следует что КФ попадает под критерий моего любимого жанра.
2. Ты - кусок мяса, против огромного количества мяса! Но не стоит недооценивать серьезных монстров, они тебя порвут!
3. Killing Floor раскрывает потенциал вооружения всего мира, что очень радует.
4. Внешний вид всего игрового процесса не вызывает отвращения, а скорее привлекает: разлетающиеся мозги зомби, анимация оружия и разъеренные Отбивальщики с Мясниками.
5. Прокачка персонажей довольно простая, но приятная.
6. Играю за снайпера, т.к. по мне самый мощный класс, на тебя все рассчитывают при появлении серьезных противников.

Покупайте KF, играйте и не жалейте о потраченном времени, ибо это весело!

A great game. Vast mod capabilities, hours of fun and gore and all around murder, good teamwork, lots of servers, and never a dull moment. No matter how bored you get, your adrenaline rushes at the piping of a bumrush. A skrake may cut your dick off, but it may not cut off your spirit. 10/10 in my personal opinion. A must-play for someone looking for indefinite enjoyment.

Если вы хотите почувствовать жар в своём анусе который горяче солнца , то да- вы играёте в Killing floor на максимальной сложности. Так же , если очень хотите, вы можете ощутить этот жар  с друзьями.
Плюсы:
+ Множество карт.
+ Большой выбор оружия и классов.
+ Достойный coop.
+ Создана на движке unreal engine.
+ Разнообразие противников.
+ Очень достойный gameplay.
Минусы:
- В очень очень очень редких случаях случаються баги.
Отценка игры 9.99 из 10
P.S. играйте только в хорошие игры <:3
